text:
Project Manager/Scrum Master

I’m passionate with delivering a high grade product within the limits of schedule and resources. For the last 3 years sucessfully managed over 10 projects with 7+ team members. In work use Agile methodologies and phylosopy. 5 years ago started as a QA Engineer, so I understand the mean of « quality ».

Location: Dnepropetrovsk, Ukraine
